General.Name: Meten Edtechx Education Group Ltd
General.Description: BTC Digital Ltd. engages in the cryptocurrency/bitcoin mining business. It also engages in mining machines resale and rental business. The company was formerly known as Meten Holding Group Ltd. and changed its name to BTC Digital Ltd. in August 2023. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Tagen Knowledge & Innovation Center, Shenzhen, China, 518000
